programme.desc: AFL action as Fremantle take on Hawthorn at Optus Stadium. A win for the Dockers would take them level with the Hawks and put them back in the top-four race.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League as rivals Melbourne and North Melbourne face-off at the MCG. The Kangaroos won 125-66 when these sides met in round two.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League clash between St Kilda and Sydney Swans at Marvel Stadium. Can the Swans pick up a win to keep their top-eight hopes alive?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Port Adelaide take on West Coast Eagles at Adelaide Oval. The Power need a win to keep their faint top-eight hopes alive.

programme.title: Sifu VS Vampire
programme.desc: In a selfish grasp at financial gain, a TV station tycoon intimidates a feng shui master into relocating his great grandfather's coffin - and pays the price.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: When an engaged couple is requested to invite their parents for a CNY client event, the fiance - who is estranged from his mother, fakes a family. However, things spiral out of control.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Director Jingle Ma reunites with Tony Leung for the 3rd instalment of the Raider's series, revolving the adventure of 2 top bounty hunters as they search for the destructive missile called Hand of God.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: A top-rated film based on a true case in Hong Kong, it tells of a young man who plots with his friend to murder & dismember his parents, resulting in a highly controversial court case.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: A veteran and a passionate street dancer both strive to reach their goals and pursue their dreams in street dancing. After overcoming many challenges, can they finally shine on stage?

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of prison corruption to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to investigate and is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Hong Kong Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee, a production head of an advertising firm, runs into her ex-boyfriend before a commercial shoot & drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong. She picks herself up with Chan's help.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai is framed for murder. He takes hostages at the police station and demands talk with a former negotiator. As they engage in a tense battle of wits, their perspectives gradually shift.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred & Flora are a married couple with a gambling addiction. During their divorce, to decide who gets their daughter's custody right, the judge orders the couple to quit gambling for a week.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Featuring an all HK-star cast, this movie depicts how a weatherman is faced with the biggest challenge of his life when he receives a shocking forecast.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: Happy Dragons
programme.desc: Four retired secret agents embark on a quest for the 'Golden Relic' which turns back time and restores their youth. As they strive to rectify past mistakes, they unravel a hidden conspiracy.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a case where the body was undiscovered for 8 years. During the investigation, the prosecutor finds all inconsistencies & suspicions fall on Choi.

programme.title: Caught In Time
programme.desc: Based on a string of real robberies and murder cases, a detective engages in a mouse-and-cat game with the 'Eagle Gang', a group of sophisticated, well-trained and ruthless robbers.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as the Asian Hawk, a top agent sent to retrieve the bronze heads of twelve animals of the Chinese Zodiac, stolen in Beijing in 1860.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about abuse in a care home for elderly and disabled. Reporter Kay goes undercover to unveil the cruel truth in broad daylight.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Nam and Fire are top racing drivers. Nam is depressed after causing a young racing driver's injury. Fire decides to compete in an illegal street car race to stand up for Nam. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: An A380 airliner is hijacked by gunmen on its maiden flight. Among the passengers is a security expert, whose daughter is one of the captives. Can he save all the passengers and avert the crisis?

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis, his marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him.

programme.title: Young Ip Man Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling, who dreams of becoming a secret agent, accidentally rescues an injured spy. He agrees to make her his apprentice, turning her upside down as she goes on madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: The owner of a small cleaning company, Chak, experiences a tough time during the pandemic. When he employs single mother Candy as his assistant, she became his saving grace.

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: "Rent-a-Family" offers relatives for rent and in the process, the trio rendering such services discover the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.
